verses.roman:
sei rasa āsvādite kaila avatāra
ānusaṅge kaila saba rasera pracāra

synonyms: sei—that; rasa—mellow; āsvādite—to taste; kaila—made; avatāra—incarnation; ānusaṅge—as a secondary motive; kaila—did; saba—all; rasera—of mellows; pracāra—broadcasting.
translation: He made His appearance to taste that conjugal mellow and incidentally to broadcast all the rasas.
